column5: Well on Tuesday Dec 11 I get the call that I am on my way to the hospital, I think He is on his way. I work down town Toronto and had to get to Bracebridge Hospital ASAP to see my baby boy being born. Conditions were crap freezing rain in Toronto then freezing rain and snow further north. After the 3hr journey to get there, meet with the Doctor and he lets me know what is going on and that evening my first baby was born and he weighed 8lbs 15.5 oz. What an experience to be there and whitness the birth of my son, and will never forget that day for the rest of my life. Here are a few pics of the little guy.       Merry Christmas everyone.
Congrats. A new little fishing buddy for Christmas, you can't top that.  All the Best to you and the Family for the Christmas Season.  Mike
Congratulations to you & your wife, you've just recieved the greatest gift of all !!
what a way to strat the holidays!  congrats!  Cheers!
Awesome...And you guys have the same haircut.
Congrats!!!  What a great Christmas gift...the best gift of all.  Hope everyone is happy and healthy!
Awesome!  Charles
Congratulations - can't think of a better Christmas gift!
Congratulations...........
congrats
welcome to fatherhood brother!  When all else goes to crap, and you're having the worst day ever, a smile on your little ones face can take it all away in a flash!  Congrats!  Ryan
Congrats!  That's awesome news!  Wish you all have a great Christmas (and hopefully some sleep too).  Stan

Awesome early Christmas present!!! Congratulations to you and the Miss's on the birth of your child. Agreed, there is nothing like it when the doctor hands you your child for the first time.  Cheers, 1leg
Thank you everyone for the responses.  Have a wonderful Christmas and all the best in the New Year.
Congrats, it doesn't get better than that
Congatulations to you and your wife for bringing a brand new human being into the world. Have a wonderful holiday season.
Congrats!!!  Just do him a favor when he gets older...hold his birthday party early , summer is always a good time  Maureen
You just got the best gift of all.LIFE. It is something special. Congrats to you,s both/three, and enjoy.
Congrats to ya... Might just have a new fishin' buddy in a few years

Congratulations. Life as you knew it is over. It gets much better now. Having your first is an impossible thing to explain to someone. The feeling that comes over you right away is amazing (at least it was for me). As soon as they're born you would do anything to protect them. How can you love anything so much,so quickly is amazing. My Mom tried to explain this to me before my daughter Clarissa was born, but you can't really know unless you experience it. I hope you all have a Merry Christmas. What's his name by the way? P.S. He has your hair LOL.

You hit the nail on the head, the feeling was amazing. His name is Ethan, and I think he has more hair than me I can't wait to take him fishing for the first time. Thanks again everyone and have a great Christmas.
Now that's a Christmas present        I just found out this week that our 7th grand-child is coming around the end of July.   I ain't old enought for all that.    Congrats to you outdoorsman.
congrats bud, you couldn't ask for anything more/better
Jay,  Congratulations on the safe and Healthy arrival of Ethan  What an amazing early Christmas gift for you.
